name: git-room-workspace
description: Workspace for the Git Room VS Code extension and collaboration backend.

scripts.build: npm run build -w extension && npm run build -w server
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w extension && npm run clean -w server
scripts.compile: npm run compile -w extension && npm run compile -w server
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w extension && npm run lint -w server
scripts.test: npm run test -w extension && npm run test -w server
